metadata.dc:author: Carballo Alvarez, Montse
metadata.dc:description: The author reviews the classifications of different peripheral access venous catheters, analyzing the criteria to select each type of catheter, their indications for use, and the advantages and inconveniences of each one.
metadata.dc:title: Cateter de acceso: venoso perif√©rico.
[Peripheral access venous catheter].
